title: VA - Cities' 97 Sampler Volume 13 (2000) [FLAC]
description:
Cities 97 Sampler Volume 13

Money Raised for Local Charities: $400,000
Original Release Date: 2001
Pressings: 30,000
Format: CD
Tracks: 16

 1.) Babylon - David Gray
 2.) Runaround - Blues Traveler
 3.) Easy Tonight - Five For Fighting
 4.) Here With Me - Dido
 5.) Sleepwalker - The Wallflowers
 6.) Chemistry - Semisonic
 7.) Fadeaway - The BoDeans
 8.) Sing - Travis
 9.) Metal and Steel - Bob Schneider
10.) If You Could Only See - Tonic
11.) Yellow - Coldplay
12.) Double Dutch - Iffy
13.) Analyse - The Cranberries
14.) Camera One - Josh Joplin Group
15.) Hanging by a Moment - Lifehouse
16.) Ridin' With The King - John Hiatt

Liner Notes ::
For more than 17 years, Cities 97 has been dedicated to playing quality music from artists and bands that stand the test of time. Each year we introduce new music and new names into the mix and invite the bands to play live on-air from our Studio C. We hope you enjoy this year's compilation of in-studio performance and when you listen, you'll remember the thousands of people who benefit from your purchase. Cities 97 thanks you for your listenership and your loyalty.

Cities 97 Sampler Volume 13 is dedicated to the memory of the victims of the September 11, 2001 terrorist attack on America.
